short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: UI verifier can be used to quickly and easily check the completeness and consistency of your Figma UI designs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The UI Verifier is a great way to check the design of your user interface quickly and easily. This tool can speed up the development process by providing you with feedback on the design of your user interface. So whether you're a software developer or a designer, or a tester make sure you know how to use the UI Verifier!

Shortcuts to toggle between design & website.
Mac: Option+D 
Windows: Alt+Shift+D
Linux: Alt+Shift+D
